## cilium policy get

Display policy node information

```
cilium policy get [<labels>] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help            help for get
  -o, --output string   json| jsonpath='{}'
```

      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
